MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA26 postcode area of Girvan. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.45pm to make a permanent repair to a faulty underground cable outside 21 Ladywell Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.18pm on the 13th of November 2020.
